nhc_headline: ...PILAR MOVING FASTER TOWARD THE WEST.... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING STILL A THREAT OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...PILAR MOVING FASTER TOWARD THE WEST.... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING STILL A THREAT OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 1:00 PM CDT Wed Nov 1
 the center of Pilar was located near 12.4, -91.2
 with movement W at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 996 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
